title: Skipping divisions
body: HI im MeerkatPvP, so i recenetly got gold V and was stoked. I feel like ive been playing really well as of late and was wondering if im eligible for skipping divisions. Or what do you have to be to be eligible? AS of right now ive got a 70% win rate in ranked with with 43 wins and 29 losses, when ive used websites like op.gg to look at my mmr is says its above average for my league. I was just curious as to whether you think i may or may not be eligible for skipping divisions.

replies.body:
You would skip depending on how high your MMR is.

You can skip from Plat V - Diamond I from what i've heard.
The last you can skip is to plat v. From there you just have to work your way up (having high MMR  will still give you high LP gains per win, you just can't skip)

Skips are based on MMR, and generally you have to be of the MMR of the higher division you'd be skipping to (IE. as a Gold V, you have to be Gold III to be eligible)

Just be happy if it happens.

As a note, all people that i know of it happening for were getting 35+ LP a game.
If you are getting matched with gold 3's or higher, you would assume you would skip.
